title: Andre Iguodala interivew and more
itunes:title: Andre Iguodala interivew and more
description:
Today on the show we had basketball player Andre Iguodala stop by where he spoke about investing, Entrepreneurship, his future In the NBA and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to and Alabama mom who was arrested for going on a school bus and fighting her child's bully and next had up and coming artist La Russell stop by to spit a free style.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
